src:
Kalahkan Arema, Penggawa Badak Lampung Diminta Tak Larut Dalam Euforia
01 Nov 2019, 23:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Milan Petrovic tak mau anak asuhnya terlarut euforia kemenangan pada laga lanjutan Shopee Liga musim 2019. Pelatih Badak Lampung ini menyebut timnya sudah ditunggu pertandingan lain yang tak kalah sengitnya.
"Kami sangat senang dengan kemenangan ini. Namun, kami sudah harus memikirkan pertandingan ke depannya," kata Milan.
"Masih ada pertandingan lawan yang harus dipikirkan. Kami harus bersiap menghadapi Borneo FC," sambungnya.
Sebelumnya, Badak Lampung sukses memungkasi tren negatif mereka dengan mengalahkan Arema FC, pada laga pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Dalam pertandingan yang dihelat di Stadion Sumpah Pemuda PKOR, Bandar Lampung, Jumat (01/11/2019), mereka menang dengan skor 4-3.
Dengan kemenangan ini, Badak Lampung sementara lolos dari zona degradasi. Saat ini, mereka berada di peringkat 13 klasemen sementara, dengan raihan 26 angka dari 26 laga.
Selain mengeluarkan mereka dari zona degradasi, kemenangan ini pun memutus tren negatif Laskar Saburai pada empat laga terakhir mereka. Dalam empat laga tersebut, mereka selalu menelan kekalahan.
Usai laga ini, Badak Lampung akan meneruskan perjalanan mereka dengan menghadapi Borneo FC, pada pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Laga ini bakal dihelat di Stadion Segiri Samarinda, Selasa (05/11).

Simak artikel selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Defeat Arema, Penggawa Lampung Asked To Not Dissolve In Euphoria
Nov 01 2019, 23:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Milan Petrovic does not want his foster children dissolved the euphoria of victory in the continued match Shopee Liga 2019 season. Lampung Rhino coach said his team had been waiting for another match that was no less fierce.
"We are very happy with this victory. However, we have to think about the game in the future," Milan said.
"There are still opposing matches to think about. We must prepare for Borneo FC," he continued.
Previously, Lampung Rhinos succeeded in overcoming their negative trend by defeating Arema FC, in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 match of the 2019 season. In the match held at the PKOR Youth Oath Stadium, Bandar Lampung, Friday (01/11/2019), they won with a score of 4-3.
With this victory, Lampung rhino temporarily escaped the relegation zone. Currently, they are ranked 13th in the standings, with 26 points from 26 matches.
In addition to removing them from the relegation zone, this victory also broke the negative trends of the Laskar Saburai in their last four matches. In these four matches, they always defeat.
After this fight, the Lampung Rhinos will continue their journey by facing Borneo FC, in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 of the 2019 season. This match will be held at Samarinda's Segiri Stadium on Tuesday (05/11).
